text.author: Kara Morgan-Short, Ingrid Finger, Sarah Grey, Michael T. Ullman
text.title: Second Language Processing Shows Increased Native-Like Neural Responses after Months of No Exposure
text.summary: This study shows that limited exposure to a second language (L2) after it is no longer being actively used generally causes attrition of L2 competence.
